MAX_TENSION_PLATEAU.rule: G-INV-04: no flat tension for more than 3 consecutive scenes
MAX_TENSION_PLATEAU.derivation: Narrative theory: reader engagement drops after 3 scenes of stasis (McKee, Truby)

MAX_TENSION_DROP.rule: G-INV-04: tension cannot drop more than 3 units between adjacent scenes
MAX_TENSION_DROP.derivation: Prevents narrative whiplash. Controlled release only.

MIN_BEATS_PER_SCENE.rule: Scene must contain at least 2 beats (action + reaction minimum)
MIN_BEATS_PER_SCENE.derivation: Scene/sequel theory: every scene needs at least goal + conflict

MAX_BEATS_PER_SCENE.derivation: Cognitive load limit: >12 beats = scene should be split

MIN_SEEDS.rule: G-INV-03: plan must plant at least 3 narrative seeds
MIN_SEEDS.derivation: Minimum for layered storytelling: 1 plot + 1 character + 1 thematic

SEED_BLOOM_MAX_DISTANCE.rule: G-INV-03: seed and bloom cannot be more than 70% of plan apart
SEED_BLOOM_MAX_DISTANCE.derivation: Reader forgets seeds planted too early. Chekhov's gun principle.

MIN_CONFLICT_TYPES.rule: G-INV-05: plan must use at least 2 distinct conflict types
MIN_CONFLICT_TYPES.derivation: Single conflict type = monotonous. Diversity = richness.

EMOTION_COVERAGE_THRESHOLD.rule: G-INV-06: 100% scenes must have emotion assignment
